product_name: Pearl Izumi EM Trail N2 Trail-Running Shoes - Men's
long_description: The lightweight, minimalist Pearl Izumi EM Trail N2 Trail-Running shoes protect feet from grueling trails thanks to their forefoot rock plates and lightweight, cushioned midsoles. 4mm heel-to-toe drop encourages a midfoot/forefoot strike to promote forward momentum and reduce the impact of heel striking. Ligthweight, breathable nylon mesh uppers feature welded thermoplastic urethane overlays for lightweight support and structure. Polyester mesh linings are highly breathable for extended comfort. N2 EVA midsoles offer shock absorption and energy return, and are ideal for neutral runners. Broad rubber outsoles on the Pearl Izumi EM Trail N2 Trail-Running shoes offer a stable platform; hard EVA forefoot rock plates protect feet from trail debris.
short_description: The lightweight, minimalist Pearl Izumi EM Trail N2 Trail-Running shoes protect feet from grueling trails thanks to their forefoot rock plates and lightweight, cushioned midsoles.
